Uses of Interface
engine.rendering.IRenderDevice

  • Packages that use IRenderDevice 
    Package Description
    engine.rendering
    Classes for rendering graphics.
    engine.rendering.opengl
    Classes for rendering graphics with OpenGL.
    engine.util.factory
    Classes to make creating objects easier.

    • Uses of IRenderDevice in engine.rendering

      Methods in engine.rendering that return IRenderDevice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRenderDevice IDisplay.getRenderDevice()
      Gets the render device that can be used with this display.
      Constructors in engine.rendering with parameters of type IRenderDevice 
      Constructor and Description
      LightMap(IRenderDevice device, int radius, Color color)
      Creates a new LightMap with a generated light
      LightMap(IRenderDevice device, int width, int height, double scale)
      Creates a blank LightMap with a certain width and height.
      RenderContext(IRenderDevice device, RenderTarget target)
      Creates a new RenderContext.
      RenderTarget(IRenderDevice device, int width, int height, int texId)
      Creates a new render target.
      RenderTarget(IRenderDevice device, int width, int height, int texId, int fbo)
      Creates a new render target based on an existing target in the device.
      Texture(IRenderDevice device, ArrayBitmap image, int filter)
      Creates a texture that can be rendered by a particular IRenderDevice.
